extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization a SATCOM network provider?

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Additional Monitoring for SATCOM Network Providers
extracted_playbook.description: Put in place additional monitoring at ingress and egress points to SATCOM equipment to look for anomalous traffic, such as insecure remote access tools, unexpected network traffic, unauthorized account usage, and brute force login attempts.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Authentication Methods
extracted_playbook.description: Use secure methods for authentication, including multifactor authentication where possible, for all accounts used to access, manage, and/or administer SATCOM networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Strong Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Use and enforce strong, complex passwords. Review password policies to ensure they align with the latest NIST guidelines. Do not use default credentials or weak passwords.

extracted_playbook.title: Audit Accounts and Credentials
extracted_playbook.description: Audit accounts and credentials: remove terminated or unnecessary accounts; change expired credentials.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Principle of Least Privilege
extracted_playbook.description: Enforce principle of least privilege through authorization policies. Minimize unnecessary privileges for identities.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Trust Relationships
extracted_playbook.description: Review existing trust relationships with IT service providers. Remove unnecessary trust relationships.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Contractual Relationships with Service Providers
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure contracts include appropriate provisions addressing security, such as monitoring and logging of provider-managed customer systems and notification of security events.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Independent Encryption
extracted_playbook.description: Implement independent encryption across all communications links leased from, or provided by, your SATCOM provider.

extracted_playbook.title: Strengthen Security of Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Strengthen the security of operating systems, software, and firmware. Ensure robust vulnerability management and patching practices are in place.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Configuration Management Programs
extracted_playbook.description: Implement rigorous configuration management programs. Regularly audit system configurations for misconfigurations and security weaknesses.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor Network Logs for Suspicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor network logs for suspicious activity and unauthorized or unusual login attempts. Integrate SATCOM traffic into existing network security monitoring tools.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Logs of Systems Behind SATCOM Terminals
extracted_playbook.description: Review logs of systems behind SATCOM terminals for suspicious activity. Ingest system and network generated logs into your enterprise security information and event management (SIEM) tool.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR) Tools
extracted_playbook.description: Implement endpoint detection and response (EDR) tools where possible on devices behind SATCOM terminals, and ingest into the SIEM.

extracted_playbook.title: Expand and Enhance Monitoring of SATCOM Network Segments
extracted_playbook.description: Expand monitoring to include ingress and egress traffic transiting SATCOM links and monitor for suspicious or anomalous network activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Baseline SATCOM Network Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Baseline SATCOM network traffic to determine what is normal and investigate deviations, such as large spikes in traffic.

extracted_playbook.title: Create and Maintain Cyber Incident Response Plans
extracted_playbook.description: Create, maintain, and exercise a cyber incident response plan, resilience plan, and continuity of operations plan for SATCOM networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Review and Implement Security Controls
extracted_playbook.description: Review and implement security controls deemed appropriate by the customer, ensuring monitoring and logging of provider-managed customer systems.
